languages.text: "Гипотеза признана обоснованной. Данная единица проводит спасательную миссию, от успешности которой зависит безопасность единицы в статусе архимагоса. Запрашиваю экстренный объем полномочий".
"The hypothesis is of merit. This unit is conducting a rescue mission in which the safety of an Archmagos-rank unit is at stake. Requesting emergency authorisation."
languages.original_text: "Гипотеза признана обоснованной. Данная единица проводит спасательную миссию, от успешности которой зависит безопасность единицы в статусе архимагоса. Запрашиваю экстренный объем полномочий".

traits.locale_text: "Hypothesis deemed to have merit. This unit is conducting a rescue mission in which the safety of an archmagos-rank unit is at stake. Requesting emergency authorisation."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

traits.locale_text: "The hypothesis is of merit. This unit is conducting a rescue mission in which the safety of an Archmagos-rank unit is at stake. Requesting emergency authorisation."

languages.text: 「その仮説は称賛に値する。当ユニットは救助任務を実行中。大賢人級ユニットの安全が脅かされているのです。緊急権限を求む」
languages.original_text: "The hypothesis is of merit. This unit is conducting a rescue mission in which the safety of an Archmagos-rank unit is at stake. Requesting emergency authorisation."

traits.locale_text: 「その仮説は称賛に値する。当ユニットは救助任務を実行中。大賢人級ユニットの安全が脅かされているのです。緊急権限を求む」
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: “这个假设有道理。本单位正在执行救援任务，大贤者级单位的安全正受到威胁，请求紧急授权。”
languages.original_text: "The hypothesis is of merit. This unit is conducting a rescue mission in which the safety of an Archmagos-rank unit is at stake. Requesting emergency authorisation."

traits.locale_text: “这个假设有道理。本单位正在执行救援任务，大贤者级单位的安全正受到威胁，请求紧急授权。”
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: « Cette hypothèse n'est pas sans mérite. Cette unité mène une mission de sauvetage dont dépend l'intégrité d'une unité de rang archimagos. Demande d'autorisation d'urgence. »
languages.original_text: "The hypothesis is of merit. This unit is conducting a rescue mission in which the safety of an Archmagos-rank unit is at stake. Requesting emergency authorisation."

traits.locale_text: « Cette hypothèse n'est pas sans mérite. Cette unité mène une mission de sauvetage dont dépend l'intégrité d'une unité de rang archimagos. Demande d'autorisation d'urgence. »
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: «Una excelente hipótesis. Esta unidad está llevando a cabo una misión de rescate en la que está en juego la seguridad de una unidad de rango Archimagos. Solicitando autorización de emergencia».
languages.original_text: "The hypothesis is of merit. This unit is conducting a rescue mission in which the safety of an Archmagos-rank unit is at stake. Requesting emergency authorisation."

traits.locale_text: «Una excelente hipótesis. Esta unidad está llevando a cabo una misión de rescate en la que está en juego la seguridad de una unidad de grupo de archimagos. Solicitando autorización de emergencia».
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: "Eine solide Hypothese. Diese Einheit führt eine Rettungsmission aus, bei der es um die Sicherheit einer Einheit von Erzmagos-Rang geht. Erbitte Notfallautorisierung."
languages.original_text: "The hypothesis is of merit. This unit is conducting a rescue mission in which the safety of an Archmagos-rank unit is at stake. Requesting emergency authorisation."

traits.locale_text: "Eine solide Hypothese. Diese Einheit führt eine Rettungsmission aus, bei der es um die Sicherheit einer Einheit von Erzmagos-Rang geht. Erbitte Notfallautorisierung."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: "Bu hipotezde doğruluk payı var. Bu birim, Başmagos rütbesindeki bir birimin güvenliğinin ilgilendiren bir kurtarma operasyonu gerçekleştirmekte. Acil erişim izni talep ediliyor."
languages.original_text: "The hypothesis is of merit. This unit is conducting a rescue mission in which the safety of an Archmagos-rank unit is at stake. Requesting emergency authorisation."

traits.locale_text: "Bu hipotezde doğruluk payı var. Bu birim, Başmagos rübesindeki bir birimin güvenliğinin tehlike altında olduğu bir kurtarma operasyonu gerçekleştirmekte. Acil erişim izni talep ediliyor."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion
